participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Alex often expresses himself in a concise manner.
participant_1.background: Alex is a graphic designer who enjoys spending time alone, diving into creative projects.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and outgoing, Jordan has a knack for comforting others with her words.
participant_2.background: Jordan works as a social worker and is passionate about helping people through their struggles.

content.text: I am sorry to hear that.
